pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, March 22, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, March 22, 2016:

Ottawa

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Budget Speech, to be delivered by the Minister of Finance in the House of Commons.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
